LONDON ( AP ) — Some British doctors and legislators reacted angrily Saturday to President Donald Trump 's pro - gun comments at [ARG0: an NRA convention] [V: comparing] [ARG1: a London hospital] [ARG2: to a war zone] [ARGM-CAU: because]
